import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LaptopList(){const[laptops,setLaptops]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:5000/get_all_laptops').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setLaptops(data.data);// API cevabında "data": [ {laptop1}, {laptop2}, ... ]
setLoading(false);}).catch(error=>{console.error('API hatası:',error);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Y\xFCkleniyor..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"T\xFCm Laptoplar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:laptops.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.laptop_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.laptop_name,width:"150"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Fiyat: ",item.price," TL"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.summary}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:item.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:"Detay"})]},index))})]});}export default LaptopList;
